title: Crime Alert 04.16.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.16.21
description:
Volunteer fireman accused of setting fire to a church. Man charged with littering after dumping fish on the side of the road.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
